QuestData.Title: The Azure Wizard
QuestData.Description:
I do not have time to quibble with sorcerers.
Go and treat with this "Archmage", $p. Learn what you may, and be on your guard always. They might be allies still or enemies yet...
Our reports indicate there's a large archival complex to the south of here.
That is where I'm going.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Archmage Khadgar in Camp Antonidas.
